msContents.summary: Volume containing several works calledMajmū‘at al-ṣanāyi‘,مجموعة الصنايع

msItem.author: Various authors
msItem.title: Miscellaneous verses in Persian or Turkish
msItem.note: Miscellaneous verses in Persian or Turkish
The authors of Persian verses, where named areṬālib,طالب, ʻUrfī Shīrāzī, Muḥammad, 1555 or 6-1590 or 91,عرفى شيرازى andShifāʼī,شفائي

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 57.

msItem.author:
ʻFattāḥī, d. ca. 1448
Muḥammad Yaḥyà Sībak, d. 852/1448-9 محمد يحيى سیبک فتاحی
msItem.title: Shabistān-i nukāt
شبستان نکات
Shabistān-i khayāl
شبستان خیال
msItem.note: Literary conceits, in prose and verse
This copy contains only the very beginning of the text
Main title has been supplied by Waley 1998, page 66.

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 66.

msItem.author:
ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, Caliph, ca. 600-661
علي بن أبي طالب، الخليفة
Wrong attribution Datedabout 977
msItem.title: Ṣad kalimah
صد کلمه
msItem.note: Min ikhtiyārāt kalām Amīr al-Muʼminīn ʻAlī
Sayings attributed to the Caliph and Imam ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭalib

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 3.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Chihil Ḥadīs̲
چهل حديث
msItem.note: Forty traditions related to the Prophet Muḥammad, with Persian renderings in verse and preface in prose
Datedabout 937

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 2.

msItem.author:
ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, Caliph, ca. 600-661
علي بن أبي طالب، الخليفة
Wrong attribution
msItem.title: Ghurar va durar
غرر و درر
msItem.note: Min ikhtiyārāt kalām Amīr al-Muʼminīn ʻAlī
Sayings in verse attributed to the Caliph and Imam ʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭalib
Datedabout 977

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 3.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Vaṣiyyat-i Imām ʻAlī
وصیة امام علی
msItem.note: Counsel given by ʻAlī to his son al-Ḥusayn
Datedabout 977

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 3.

msItem.author: Various authors
msItem.title: Miscellaneous verses in Persian or Turkish
msItem.note: Miscellaneous verses in Persian or Turkish

Miscellany containing hints (some in Arabic) on identifying names, the finder of a ring, and the day of the new moon; Arabic verses attributed toʻAlī ibn Abī Ṭālib, Caliph, ca. 600-661,علي بن أبي طالب، الخليفة , ; chronograms, some associated with thePanj ganj (پنج گنج), ofAmīr Khusraw Dihlavī, ca. 1253-1325,امير حسرو دهلوى , one withJāmī, 1414-1492,جامى , and others withSelim I, Sultan of the Turks, 1470-1520,سليم‏ , and other Ottoman notables; qiṭaʼāt; numerous ghazals (some in Ottoman) by Jalīlī; and three rebāʻīs and a fard

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 57.

msItem.author: Awḥad al-Dīn Kirmānī, Ḥāmid ibn Abī al-Fakhr, d. 1237 or 8 اوحدالدين كرمانى، حامد بن ابى الفخر
msItem.title: Tarjīʻāt-i Awḥad al-Dīn-i Kirmānī
ترجیعات اوحد الدین کرمانی
msItem.note: A tarjīʻ poem in 21 stanzas attributed to Awḥad al-Dīn-i Kirmānī, d. 697/1298

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 40.

msItem.author: Various authors
msItem.title: Miscellaneous verses in Persian or Turkish
msItem.note: Miscellaneous verses in Persian or Turkish

Miscellany containing poems byJalāl al-Dīn Rūmī, Maulana, 1207-1273,جلال الدين رومي، مولانا، ,Sulṭān Valad, 1226-1312,سلطان ولد ,Hamadanī, Sayyid Ḥusain,همدانى، سيّد حسين ,Naʼīmī,نعمى ,Niʻmat Allāh Valī, 1330?-1431,نعمة الله ڤلي ,Nasīmī, d. 796/1394,نسيمی ,Qāsim al-Anvār,قاسم الانوار , andṢalāḥ al-Dīn,صلاح الدین , and in Turkish

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 57.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Lamaʻāt
لمعات
msItem.note: Datedabout 937

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 8.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Faqrnāmah
فقرنامه
msItem.note: A brief tract on some principles of Sufism
Datedabout 937

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 10.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Risālah dar bayān-i faqr
رساله در بیان فقر
msItem.note: An untitled text on faqr or poverty in the spiritual sense
Preceeded by two ghazals by oneShaykh Muḥammadand followed by two rubāʻīs
Datedabout 937
Title has been supplied by Waley 1998, page 10.

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 10.

msItem.author: Ghazzālī, 1058-1111 أبو حامد الغزالی
msItem.title: Risālah min al adab
رساله من الأدب
msItem.note: Apparently an extract fromZād-i ākhirat (زاد آخرت), a treatise on ethics and spirituality here attributed toGhazzālī, 1058-1111>
Dated938

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 10.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Sulūknāmah
سلوکنامه
msItem.note: A text on three types of traveller on the Sufi Path, and ten principles of Sufism
Dated938

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 10.

msItem.author:
Lâmiî Çelebi, 1472-1532
Maḥmūd ibn ʻUs̲mān Lāmiʻī, d. 938/1535 لامعى چلبى
msItem.title: Risālah min al-ʻarūz̤
رساله من العروض
msItem.note: A treatise on prosody

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 65.

msItem.author: Anonymous
msItem.title: Manāqib Manṣūr Ḥallāj min al-taṣavvuf
مناقب منصور حلاج من التصوف
msItem.note: A collection of anecdotes about the controversial Sufial-Ḥusayn ibn Manṣūr al-Ḥallāj, d. 309/922,حلاج، الحسين ابن منصور
With amendments in pencil

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 57.

msItem.author: Anṣārī al-Harawī, ʻAbd Allāh ibn Muḥammad, 1006-1089 أنساري الهروى، عبد الله بن محمد
msItem.title: Risālah dar taṣavvuf
رساله در تصوف
Risālah li-l Shaykh ʻAbd Allāh al-Anṣarī
رسالۀ لشيخ عبد الله أنساري
msItem.note: A tract on Sufism partly in verse, here attributed to ʻAbd Allāh Anṣārī
Dated937

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, pages 10-11.

msItem.author:
Kātibī Turshī̄zī, Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd Allāh, d. ca. 1434
كاتبی
نيشاپوری
msItem.title: Rubāʻiyyāt-i Kātibī
رباعیات کاتبی
Dar khātimah-ʼi kitāb… Kātibī-rāst
در خاتمۀ کتاب ... کاتبی راست
msItem.note: Poems, almost entirely rubāʻiyyāt, from theDīvān-i Kātibī,ديوان كاتبی
Dated937

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 41.

msItem.author:
Naṣr Allāh
نصر الله
msItem.title: Mas̲navī
مثنوی
msItem.note: Part or the whole of an unidentified Sufi didactic poem
Followed by a few dū-baytīs and fards
Dated937
Title has been supplied by Waley 1998, page 53.

listBibl.bibl: For a more detailed description see Waley 1998, page 53.

recordHist.source: Manuscript description based on M. I. Waley: Supplementary handlist of Persian manuscripts, 1966-1998. London, 1998

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card for admissions procedures contactBritish Library, Registering for a Reader Pass). Contactapac-enquiries@bl.ukfor further information on the availability of this manuscript
